--- create_change_stream_for_all.sql
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR ALL

--- AST
&ast.CreateChangeStream{
  Create: 0,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 21,
    NameEnd: 39,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch:    []*ast.ChangeStreamWatch(nil),
  WatchAll: true,
  Options:  []ast.Expr(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR ALL
